mapper.update:
update ${tableName}
relation_id = #{relationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Aproportion = #{aproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Bproportion = #{bproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Cproportion = #{cproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update ${tableName} set relation_id = #{relationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Aproportion = #{aproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Bproportion = #{bproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Cproportion = #{cproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Dproportion = #{dproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Eproportion = #{eproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Fproportion = #{fproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Answerproportion = #{answerproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resultMessage = #{resultmessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME=#{tableName}
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( `id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `relation_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `Aproportion` int(2) default NULL, `Bproportion` int(2) default NULL, `Cproportion` int(2) default NULL, `Dproportion` int(2) default NULL, `Eproportion` int(2) default NULL, `Fproportion` int(2) default NULL, `Answerproportion` int(2) NOT NULL, `resultMessage` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `createTime` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )
